exercises.name: box jumps
requirements: sturdy box at least two feet high
exercises.description: Plant both feet should length apart and jump onto the box. Once on the box, stand fully upright.

exercises.name: v ups
exercises.description: Lie flat on the ground, then raise your legs and arms slightly off the matt.

exercises.name: assisted pullups
exercises.description: Kneel on the machine and adjust the weight to your needs

exercises.name: assisted dips
exercises.description: Kneel on the machine and adjust the weight to your needs
